member.name: T:AtelierMorpion.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:AtelierMorpion.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:AtelierMorpion.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:AtelierMorpion.Server.isGameExist(System.String)
member.summary: Fonction permettant de savoir si une partie existe grâce à son identifiant
member.returns: TRUE si la partie existe, sinon FALSE
